summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting easements over a portion of Lots 11 and 16, Shurick Extension of Carleton Beach Tracts; over a portion of Lots 12 and 14, Division "A" Carleton Beach Tracts; and over portions of Lots 20, 21 and 23, Division "B" Carleton Beach Tracts for sanitary sewer purposes. (Perkins Lane West, Sanitary Sewer Project)
